SA11sanss05u:5_0: ādikarmikabodhisatvaiḥ samādānāni yathā gṛhītāni tathā kāryaṃ /
SA11sanss05u:9_0: ete vayaṃ bhagavann adyâgreṇa tathāgatasya purataḥ /
SA11sanss05u:11_0: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyâgreṇa bodhisatvayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ gṛhiṇaṃ vā pravrajitaṃ vâpattyā codayiṣyāmo bhūtena vâbhūtena vā visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhavet /
SA11sanss05u:12_0: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyâgreṇa bodhisatvayānikaṃ pudgalam avamanyemâvarṇaṃ câsya bhāṣema visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhaved arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
SA11sanss05u:13_0: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyâgreṇa bodhisatvayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ gṛhiṇaṃ vā pravrajitaṃ vā pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍantaṃ paricārayantaṃ daṣṭvâprasādaṃ kuryāma vilekhaṃ vā cittasyôtpādayemâgauravaṃ vôtpādayema na ca tatra śāstṛsaṃjñām utpādayema /
SA11sanss05u:15_0: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyâgreṇa mitrakulabhikṣād akulanidānaṃ bodhisatvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ kāyapīḍāṃ cittapīḍāṃ vā kuryāma visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet /
SA11sanss05u:16_0: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyâgreṇa bodhisatvayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ dṛṣṭvâikenâpy amanojñavacanenâbhāṣema visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet /
SA11sanss05u:17_0: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyâgreṇa triskṛtvo rātreḥ triskṛtvo divasya bodhisatvayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ na namasyema visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet /
SA11sanss05u:18_0: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyâgreṇâsya vratasamādānasya kṛtaśo rājyapratilambhaṃ vā dhanapratilambhaṃ vā kāyajīvitaṃ vā na parityajema
SA11sanss05u:21_0: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyâgreṇa śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā pudgalam avamanyema /
SA11sanss05u:22_0: vayaṃ viśiṣṭatarā nâite iti visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet /
SA11sanss05u:22_1: saced vayaṃ bhagavan nīcacittāś caṇḍālasadṛśacittā na viharema visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet /
SA11sanss05u:23_0: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyâgreṇâtmānam utkarṣayema paraṃ vā paṃsayema visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet /
SA11sanss05u:24_0: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyâgreṇa vyāpādavigrahabhayād yojanaṃ vā yojanaśataṃ vā na palāyemêritāḥ samānā visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet /
SA11sanss05u:25_0: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyâgreṇa śīlavantam ātmānaṃ pratijānīma bahuśrutaṃ vā dhutaguṇinaṃ vânyatarânyatareṇa vā guṇenâtmānam udbhāvayema visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet /
SA11sanss05u:26_0: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyâgreṇa praticchannakalyāṇā vivṛtapāpā na viharema visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhaved arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
SA11sanss05u:28_0: tatra bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam āmantrayate sma /
SA11sanss05u:31_0: kṣapayitukāmena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vâivaṃ samādānaṃ kartavyaṃ yathâibhiḥ kulaputraiḥ kṛtam iti /
SA11sanss05u:49_0: tair na dvitīyasya bodhisatvasya sarvacaryāsu vipratipattavyaṃ /
SA11sanss05u:53_0: idaṃ ca khalu kulaputrârthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyaṃs tathāgatâivaṃ-
SA11sanss05u:57_0: ahaṃ vā pudgalaṃ pramiṇuyāṃ yo vā syān mādṛśaḥ //
SA11sanss05u:58_0: yaḥ kulaputrâtmānaṃ rakṣitukāmas tena na kasyacic caryā vivecayitavyā /
SA11sanss05u:63_0: atha tāvad eva bahūni śatasahasrāṇi vidvāṃsaḥ satvôtthāyâsanād yena bhagavāṃs tenâñjaliṃ praṇamyâivam āhuḥ /
SA11sanss05u:64_0: vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavataḥ puratâivaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kurmaḥ yāvac ciraṃ vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan saṃsāre saṃsarema tāvan mātra pratilabdhakṣāntikāmā rājasthānaṃ pratilabhema /
SA11sanss05u:74_0: mā kuṭumbijyeṣṭhasthānaṃ yāvat sarvaśo vayaṃ mā satvānām adhipatisthānaṃ pratilabhema yāvan na kṣāntipratilabdhāḥ syāma /
SA11sanss05u:75_0: yato nidānaṃ vayam evaṃrūpam atigāḍhaṃ karma buddhānāṃ śāsanam ākṣipema /
SA11sanss05u:78_0: nâsti pāpam akartavyaṃ kumārā teṣu bheṣyati /
SA11sanss05u:81_0: vaṃ sārddhaṃ kuryāḥ tvaṃ kāli paścime //
SA11sanss05u:85_0: varṣâgraṃ paripṛcchitvā yas te vṛddhataro bhavet /
SA11sanss05u:87_0: na teṣāṃ skhalitaṃ paśyed bodhimaṇḍaṃ vipaśyatāṃ /
SA11sanss05u:88_0: pratighātaṃ na janayet maitracittaḥ sadā bhavet //
SA11sanss05u:89_0: yady eṣāṃ skhalitaṃ paśyed doṣāṃs teṣāṃ na kīrtayet /
SA11sanss05u:90_0: yādṛśaṃ kāhiti karma tādṛśaṃ lapsyate phalaṃ //
SA11sanss05u:92_0: pūrvâbhāṣī bhaven nityaṃ hatamānaś ca sarvataḥ //
SA11sanss05u:93_0: cīvaraiḥ piṇḍapātaiś ca kuryāt teṣām anugrahaṃ /
SA11sanss05u:94_0: evaṃ cittaṃ pradadhyās tvaṃ sarve bheṣyanti nāyakā /
SA11sanss05u:96_0: yasya ca bodhicittôtpādike gauravaṃ prasādaś ca nôtpadyete /
SA11sanss05u:97_0: tena svadurgatiprapātabhayarakṣârthaṃ dṛṣṭâdṛṣṭaprāmodyânubhavanârthaṃ svacittakaluṣaprasādanârthaṃ cittakalyatācittakarmaṇyatāpratilābhârthaṃ ca yathâryagaṇḍavyūhe bodhicittôtpādikaguṇā bhagavadāryamaitreyeṇâcāryasudhanam adhikṛtyôdbhāvitās tathā bhāvayitavyāḥ /
SA11sanss05u:98_0: eṣa dṛṣṭva jaravyādhipīḍitān prāṇino duṣkhaśatair upadrutān /
SA11sanss05u:109_0: śūrasūtâbhayasya dāyako daiśako hi jagato bhaviṣyati //
SA11sanss05u:121_0: śuddhi vartti trimalattamo 'py ahaṃ maitrisneha smṛtibhājanaṃ dṛḍham /
SA11sanss05u:137_0: eṣa sarvajagamokṣaṇôdyato eṣa te sada viśeṣa paṇḍitaḥ //
SA11sanss05u:139_0: mokṣamārgam upaneṣyate jagad yādṛśe guṇapathe pratiṣṭhitaḥ //
SA11sanss05u:147_0: caturbhir maitreya dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne 'kṣato 'nupahataḥ svastinā parimokṣyate /
SA11sanss05u:162_0: ādikarmikeṇa maitreya bodhisatvena prajñābalâdhānaprāptena lābhasatkāraparivarjitena lābhasatkāradoṣadarśinā bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss05u:174_0: iha maitreya bodhisatvena mahāsatvena rāgasaṃjanano lābhasatkāraḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss05u:199_0: ime evaṃrūpā maitreya lābhasatkāre ādīnavā ye bodhisatvena pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
SA11sanss05u:202_0: alpêcchasya hi maitreyêmae evaṃrūpā doṣā na bhavanti na câsyântarāyā bhavanti buddhadharmāṇāṃ /
SA11sanss05u:210_0: spaṣṭaś ca bhavati māyāśāṭhyaprahīṇo 'pramattaś ca bhavati pañcakāmaguṇadoṣadarśī yathāvādī tathākārī bhavaty āryavaṃśe sthitaḥ /
SA11sanss05u:212_0: imāṃ maitreyâivaṃrūpām anuśaṃsāṃ viditvā paṇḍitena bodhisatvenâdhyāśayenâlpêcchatāyāṃ rantavyaṃ /
SA11sanss05u:215_0: vijahya rāgaṃ vijahya doṣaṃ na tiṣṭhate saṃgaṇikāsu yogī /
SA11sanss05u:258_0: cittaṃ na kāyaś ca prasanna bhoti /
SA11sanss05u:284_0: na tasya jātū dṛḍha buddhi bhotī /
SA11sanss05u:311_0: tasmād dhi bhāṣye tu ratiṃ vihāya /
SA11sanss05u:323_0: viheṭhayante ca vane vasantaṃ yasmāna middhe 'bhiratiṃ prayāti //
SA11sanss05u:325_0: dharme ca chando na hi bhoti tasya /
SA11sanss05u:326_0: adharmakāyaś ca sa bhoti bhūyo yasmāna middhe 'bhiratiṃ prayāti //
SA11sanss05u:337_0: ātmā tu jñātvā ca kusīdaprāptaḥ īrṣyāyate vīryabalair upetān /
SA11sanss05u:338_0: vīryânvitānāṃ câvarṇa bhāṣate yasmāna middhe 'bhiratiṃ prayāti //
SA11sanss05u:364_0: bhakte ca coḍe ca bhavaty abhīkṣṇaṃ /
SA11sanss05u:369_0: yuktaiś ca mantraiḥ sa na vindate ratiṃ /
SA11sanss05u:372_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam etad avocat /
SA11sanss05u:373_0: suparīttaprajñās te bhagavan bodhisatvā bhaviṣyanti vihīnaprajñā ye 'gradharmān varjayitvā hīnāni karmāṇy ārapsyante /
SA11sanss05u:374_0: evam ukte bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam etad avocat /
SA11sanss05u:378_0: suparīttaprajñās te bodhisatvā bhaviṣyanti ye 'gradharmān parivarjayitvā hīnāni karmāṇy ārapsyante /
SA11sanss05u:379_0: api tv ārocayāmi te maitreya prativedayāmi te /
SA11sanss05u:382_0: śāsane pravrajitā yeṣāṃ nâsti yogo nâsti dhyānaṃ nâsti prahāṇaṃ nâsty adhyayanaṃ nâsti bāhuśrutyaparyeṣṭiḥ /
SA11sanss05u:383_0: api tu maitreya dhyānaprahāṇaprabhāvitaṃ tathāgataśāsanaṃ jñānasaṃskṛtaṃ jñānasamāhitaṃ abhiyogaprabhāvitaṃ /
SA11sanss05u:385_0: ayuktayogānām etat karma saṃsārâbhiratānāṃ yad uta vaiyāpṛtyaṃ laukikakṛtyapaligodhaḥ /
SA11sanss05u:387_0: sacen maitreya vaiyāpṛtyâbhirato bodhisatvaḥ saptaratnamayaiḥ stūpair imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ pūrayet /
SA11sanss05u:388_0: nâhaṃ tenârādhito bhaveyaṃ na mānito nâpi satkṛtaḥ //
SA11sanss05u:390_0: tatra jambūdvīpaḥ pūritaḥ syād vaiyāpṛtyakarair bodhisatvaiḥ /
SA11sanss05u:392_0: jambūdvīpapramāṇaiś côddeśasvâdhyāyâbhiyuktair bodhisatvair ekasya pratisaṃlayanâbhiyuktasya bodhisatvasyôpasthānaparicaryā kartavyā /
SA11sanss05u:395_0: duṣkaram etat karma yad uta prajñākarma /
SA11sanss05u:396_0: uttaraṃ niruttaraṃ sarvatrailokyaprativiśiṣṭam abhyudgataṃ tasmāt tarhi maitreya bodhisatvena yogârthikena vīryam ārabdhukāmena prajñāyām abhiyoktavyam iti /
SA11sanss05u:403_0: doṣān imān samyag avetya paṇḍitaḥ sarvān prapañcān parivarjīta /
SA11sanss05u:411_0: na tatra vāsaṃ na niketu kuryān muhūrttamātraṃ stiya yatra kleśaḥ //
SA11sanss05u:414_0: na vo 'sti kṣetraṃ na kṛṣir vaṇijyā /
SA11sanss05u:416_0: na putra dhītā na ca vo 'sti bhāryā /
SA11sanss05u:417_0: na câsya mitraṃ na ca bandhuvargaḥ /
SA11sanss05u:431_0: dharṣeti māraṃ sacalaṃ savāhanaṃ yo dhīru tasyâiva janeti kṣāntim /
SA11sanss05u:435_0: tasmāt tarhi maitreya bodhisatvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmapralope vartamāne 'kṣatanânupahatena svastinā parimoktukāmena sarvakarmâvaraṇāni kṣapayitukāmenâsaṃsargâbhiratena bhavitavyam araṇyavanaprāntavāsinânabhiyuktasatva parivarjitenâtmaskhalitagaveṣiṇā paraskhalitâgaveṣiṇā tuṣṇībhāvâbhiratena prajñāpāramitāvihārâbhiratenêti /
SA11sanss05u:437_0: tāvat piṇḍāya carati yāvad asya kāryasya prāptir bhavati /
SA11sanss05u:438_0: anyatra yeṣu sthāneṣu caṇḍā vā kukkurās taruṇavatsā vā gāvaḥ prakṛtiduḥśīlā vā tiryagyonigatā /
SA11sanss05u:443_0: anenâitad darśitaṃ bhavati yad dṛṣṭe 'pi bādhākarâivaṃvidhe /
SA11sanss05u:445_0: atha yad evamādy anarthavarjanam uktaṃ kenâital labhyate sarvaniṣphalasyandavarjanāt /
SA11sanss05u:448_0: sa niṣphalatvād varjayitavyaḥ //yathā candrapradīpasūtre kāyasaṃvaramadhye paṭhyate /
SA11sanss05u:449_0: na hastalolupo bhavati na pādalolupaḥ hastapādasaṃyatêti //
SA11sanss05u:450_0: tathā daśadharmakasūtre 'pi deśitaṃ hastavikṣepaḥ pādavikṣepo 'dhāvanaṃ paridhāvanaṃ laṅghanaṃ plavanam idam ucyate kāyadauṣṭhulyam iti /
SA11sanss05u:452_0: āryadharmasaṃgītisūtre tu yathā bodhisatvānāṃ parârthād anyat karma na kalpate /
SA11sanss05u:453_0: tathā spaṣṭam eva paridīpitaṃ yat kiñcid bhagavan bodhisatvānāṃ kāyakarma yat kiñcid vākkarma yat kiñcin manaskarma tat sarvaṃ satvâvekṣitaṃ pravartate mahākaruṇâdhipateyaṃ satvahitâdhiṣṭhānanimittaṃ sarvasatvahitasukhâdhyāśayapravṛttaṃ /
SA11sanss05u:455_0: sa mayā pratipattiḥ pratipattavyayā sarvasatvānāṃ hitâvahā sukhâvahā ca //
SA11sanss05u:460_0: tad yathâpi nāma chidrān mārutaḥ praviśati /
SA11sanss05u:461_0: evam eva yato yatâiva cittasya chidraṃ bhavati tatas tatâiva māro 'vatāraṃ labhate /
SA11sanss05u:462_1: tatrêyam achidracittatā yad idaṃ sarvâkārajñatāyāḥ śūnyatāyāḥ paripūrir iti /
SA11sanss05u:471_0: nām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayatîty atra prastāve yāni cânyāni punaḥ kānicid anyāny api cittavikṣepakarāṇi yāni samādhiskandhasya vipakṣāya saṃvartante /
